original_title: UFC Fight Night 190: Gane vs. Volkov
overview: UFC Fight Night 190: Gane vs. Volkov was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on June 26, 2021 at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States. A heavyweight bout between Ciryl Gane and former Bellator Heavyweight World Champion Alexander Volkov served as the event's headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night 190: Gane vs. Volkov
